formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Molarity: \( M = \dfrac{n}{V} \) where \( n \) is moles of solute and \( V \) is solution volume in liters. Using mass and molecular weight: \( M = \dfrac{m / MW}{V} = \dfrac{m}{MW \cdot V} \) Rearrangements: \( m = M \cdot MW \cdot V \) and \( V = \dfrac{m}{MW \cdot M} \) Unit conversions: \( 1\,\text{L} = 1000\,\text{mL} = 10^6\,\mu\text{L};\quad 1\,\text{g} = 1000\,\text{mg} = 10^6\,\mu\text{g} \)
